column3:
Easy to install modular tile for recessed well applications
Designed for MEDIUM traffic conditions - Up to 400,000 people/year
High Performance, flexible tiles with a vinyl base and dual fiber carpet strips scrape, remove and capture dirt and moisture
Resistance to mildew and UV aging
Tiles snap together and can be cut for a custom fit
Grooves in the vinyl base are large enough to effectively trap and hold dirt, but small enough to prevent high heels from getting stuck

Unique "T" blade design prevents debris from lodging within the grille

column3:
Designed for MEDIUM traffic conditions - Up to 400,000 people/year
Vinyl loops scrape, trap and hide dirt and moisture, minimizing re-tracking into the building
Cushioned vinyl backing protects floors from removed soil and will not stain flooring
Durable vinyl construction performs in temperatures from -10°F to 150°F (-23°C to 65°C)
Fade-resistant

Durable construction withstands heavy traffic
Easily cut on site to any angle, arc, or shape. Stable - conforms to uneven sub-floors

Can be used with Schlüter™ frame.

Dual-strip design both scrapes off debris and absorbs moisture
Easily cut on site to any angle, arc or shape
Durable construction withstands heavy traffic
Quiet - eliminates noise and clatter common with aluminum roll-up mats
Anti-slip surface for indoor applications; ADA compliant
T section divider is optional for wheeled traffic applications

column3:
Ideal for light industrial and light to medium commercial applications where people stand for extended periods of time
Spring-coiled vinyl compresses uniformly and continually, helping provide greater comfort and less fatigue
Textured top surface provides a high coefficient of friction for slip resistance
Coils are permanently fixed to the top surface and will not delaminate or separate when wet like foam mats
Lightweight for easy moving and positioning

column3:
Provides comfort and safety for wet areas in the workplace where people stand for extended periods of time
Rigid vinyl Z-web construction provides firm support and allows cart traffic
Extended ridge design provides increased traction in wet areas, helping reduce slips and falls
Open Z-web design allows liquids and small debris to fall through enhancing the security of footing

column3:
Designed for light to medium industrial areas where people stand for extended periods of time
Spring-coiled vinyl compresses uniformly and continually, helping provide greater comfort and less fatigue
Textured top surface provides a high coefficient of friction for slip resistance
Solid top allows debris to stay on top of the mat for easy cleaning
Special grease and oil-resistant coating keeps mat resilient over time, providing continuous comfort

column1:
Poolside, locker rooms, beneath water fountains.

CleanZone™ Zone 4: Interior

Warranty 1 year: replacement
column3:
Cushioned vinyl loops provide comfortable surface for barefoot traffic
Coiled vinyl loops reduce impact of dropped items that may otherwise shatter and be a danger to barefoot traffic
Open construction allows water to drain through, helping keep surfaces drier
Improves slip resistance, helping reduce falls
Antimicrobial coating provides resistance to mildew, fungus and odors in the mat

FormatTile

Tile Size
18" x 18"
Sizes are approximate

Case Pack
1/4" = 12 tiles/case (27 sq ft) - full cases only
7/16" = 10 tiles/case (22.5 sq ft) - full cases only

Thickness
1/4" or 7/16"
Tile Weight
1/4" = 0.56 lb/sq ft
7/16" = 0.98 lb/sq ft

Installation
Glue Down

column3:
Designed for HEAVY traffic conditions - Up to 1,000,000 people/year
Dual fiber, random pattern provides excellent dirt and water removal and allows sand, salt and dirt to hide until it can be removed
Solution-dyed fibers resist fading and staining and keep the mat looking good longer
Flexion Vinyl backing will not stain floor and prevents dirt and moisture from reaching the floor
Low profile allows foot, cart and wheelchair traffic to move easily over the mat
Standard Edging - 4 sided factory edge on all standard sizes

column1:
Indoor entrances, vestibules, lobbies.

CleanZone™ Zone 2: Vestibule, Zone 3: Lobby
column3:
Designed for EXTREME traffic conditions. Up to and greater than 1,000,000 people/year
Dual fiber, random pattern provides exceptional dirt and water removal and allows sand, salt and dirt to blend in until it can be removed
Solution-dyed fibers resist fading and staining and help keep the mat looking good longer
Multicoated, fiberglass-reinforced vinyl backing provides a water barrier for the floor, helping to prevent mold, mildew, fungus and water damage
Low profile allows foot, cart and wheelchair traffic to move easily over the mat

column3:
Heavy rubber weight room and fitness matting protects floors and equipment from damage
Shock absorbent and spike resistant
Easy and economical to install, requires no adhesives; yet does not shift once installed

Note: Blooming (white discoloration) may occur.  This is an aesthetic issue only, and does not compromise product performance or pose any safety/health issues.

column10:
Square Edge Tile, Interlocking Tile

Size
Square Edge Tile: 38" x 38"
Interlocking Tile: 37" x 37"
Sizes are approximate

Thickness
Square Edge Tile: 4 mm, 5 mm, 6 mm, 7 mm, 8 mm, 9 mm, 10 mm, 12 mm
Interlocking Tile: 8 mm, 9 mm, 10 mm, 12 mm


Recommended Installation
4 mm tiles must be glued down. We strongly recommend a glue down installation for 6 mm tiles. 8 mm, 10 mm and 12 mm tiles can be loose laid.

Interlocking Tile: 37" x 37"

column3:
Designed for HIGH traffic conditions (1,500 to 5,000 people per day).
The dual-fiber construction eliminates and hides dirt and moisture.
Advanced water removal and retention properties – stops up to 80% of dirt and moisture at the door.
The fiber loop system simultaneously scrapes off soil and absorbs water.
The loops are randomly arranged delivering excellent durability and appearance over time. 
Available as factory edged mats, custom sized mats or rolls.

Please note: You will receive a chain set for this collection

Absorbent polypropylene fibers are needle punched and heat fused to give the top surface superior durability.
Leakproof poly backing prevents liquid from passing through to the floors.
Fully coated adhesive backing holds tight but peels up easily.
Absorbs a wide variety of liquids including water, oil and grease.
Absorbs up to 8 gallons per roll.

column3:
Formative Clic is inspired by the beauty and design of natural hardwood floors. Formative Clic offers all of the refinement of authentic wood planks combined with the benefits of resilient flooring.

Formative Clic features:


Easy installation: Formative Clic planks click together easily with an edge-locking system for a glue-less installation that saves labor time and money.
Quick shipping: Heavy inventory levels available in the US provide for immediate delivery, allowing tight timelines to be met.
Acoustic backing: The acoustic backing dampens sound transmission with an IIC value of 61 (ASTM E492), creating a quieter and more comfortable environment.
column5: Mats Inc | Formative Clic
column35:
Multi-family, Hotels, Restaurants, Retail

CleanZone™ Zone 4: Interior
Warranty 10 Year Limited

column1: Fitness facilities
column3: Durable, versatile and recyclable roll goods turf products that look and feel like natural grass. Used primarily for multi-purpose installations such as weight rooms & group training facilities. Our non-infill synthetic turf systems feature a short pile height, narrow gauge and high stitch rate as well as built-in padding for comfort and shock absorption.
